desc: Isle of Wool stocks a wide variety of yarns and crafts that can also be purchased on our website. We are based on the Isle of Wight but can ship UK wide.

layout.text:
We are a family run wool and craft supplies shop on the sunny Isle of Wight.
There is free postage on orders over £25.
We use Royal mail 2nd class and pay for tracking so that we can be confident that your packages will arrive safely.
We aim to offer great products and great customer service. If you can't see what you're looking for, feel free to drop us a message and we'll try our best to help you.
